data.title: How old is Jay Z?
data.meta_description: How old is Jay Z? Learn the birthday of Jay Z and the exact age in years, months and days, with additional information of the singer.
data.text: Jay Z, or Shawn Corey Carter, is a famous American rapper and one of the owners of Roc-a-Fella Records, working with most of the American famous rappers of modern times. Born in Brooklyn, New York, since his childhood Shawn has learned how to overcome the difficulties of life. He started his musical career in 1995 by establishing his own label and recording his own albums, along with opening a search for new talents in the field of rap and hip-hop. Jay Z has released 13 solo albums so far, which helped him to gain the title of the best selling and the greatest MC of all times, as well as to become a winner of 21 Grammy awards. In contrast to the most of other rappers, Jay Z is known as the one with the least rebellious and controversial lifestyle. He is a very successful businessman, with plenty of companies and businesses focused on video games, clothing, beverage producing, media technology, and so on. He is the husband of a famous singer Beyonce, and the couple has 3 children.
